entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this evening then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight then light before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
